Honeywell solutions to the TCAS 7.1 mandate reduce the risk of mid-air collisions in increasingly congested skies.
From December 2015, compliance with TCAS II Change 7.1 will be compulsory for aircraft travelling in European airspace. Honeywell’s TCAS upgrade solutions offer ground-breaking technology that combines enhanced capability and superior performance.
• Honeywell’s TCAS solutions offer Hybrid Surveillance functionality as standard.
• Honeywell is a pioneer in the development of Traffic Collision Avoidance Systems (TCAS), with over 300 million logged departures.
• TCAS Solutions are available today. Now is the time to act.
• For more information and to download the white paper please click here. <http://hwll.co/2995> To learn more about Honeywell's suite of RMU's, please contact your Honeywell Account or Sales Representative. Alternatively, visit the Honeywell Performance Accelerator <https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/> for more information on the other upgrades available to improve your aircraft's performance.
